message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this high-quality item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $13500.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $13500 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time.  I'm willing to pay $12500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer of $12500. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not quite ready to accept that price yet. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $13750. Let me know what you think.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While $13750 is a bit closer, I'm still hoping to come in lower.  Would you be willing to accept $13000 for the product? It's a fair price for both of us.

Hi Bob, I understand your desire to get a good deal, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm not quite ready to accept $13000 yet. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $14000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I hope you can meet me in the middle.
